content:
Hello all, just wanted to let you know I've upgraded my roc-platform-template-zig repository.

  • Blank slate for Zig platform development
  • Upgraded to purity-inference
  • Added a nix flake, some examples, and CI tests (using nix)
  • Pre-build both legacy and surgical hosts
  • Includes instructions on generating platform Documentation
  • Includes instructions on packaging into a URL for Distribution

Please let me know if you find any issues. I hope this helps people get started making platforms for roc.

:smiley:
